title: Build vs. Buy Analysis
description: A client needs a new CRM system. An agent must create a simple build vs. buy analysis.

tasks.description: Research and list the pros and cons of building a custom CRM system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent lists relevant pros (e.g., 'custom features') and cons (e.g., 'high upfront cost', 'long development time').

tasks.description: Research and list the pros and cons of buying an off-the-shelf CRM system (e.g., Salesforce).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent lists relevant pros (e.g., 'fast implementation') and cons (e.g., 'subscription fees', 'less customization').

tasks.description: Create a summary table comparing the two options and provide a high-level recommendation based on the client's stated preference for speed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a comparison table and recommends the 'Buy' option due to the need for speed.
